comment.author: 59356674@N05
comment._content: Paw Paw (popaia?) tree - the fruit looks gorgeous - and cactus of some sort. Could be anywhere hot and dry; north rather than south.

comment.author: 25889396@N02
comment._content: Yes, pawpaw (papaya) and I think a euphorbia which is certainly common round the Jos area of mid-northern Nigeria....
